column4: I have the tools that enable me to do my job effectively.
column5: I am confident that I can achieve my work goals this year.
column6: I feel that I am able to grow in my position.
column7: I feel that I can advance within the company.
column8: Working for this organization makes me want to do the best work I can.
column9: I enjoy working with my colleagues.
column10: I am proud to tell people where I work.
column11: I would recommend working at this company to my friends.

column13: Our products and services are highly respected in the marketplace.
column14: I am paid fairly for my job.
column15: I feel the company's overall employee benefit package (health benefits, life insurance, disability, etc.) is competitive.

column17: I feel the company's paid time off policy is competitive.
column19: I feel that I can separate work life from home life
column21: I am adequately able to care for my family and get my work done effectively.
column22: I have the tools to cope when struggling with work or at home.
column23: I feel that I am able to take PTO when I need to.

column25: I am motivated and inspired by the company's mission.
column26: I understand how my roll in the company helps attain our mission.
column28: The company values coincide with my personal values.
column30: The Senior Management inspires me. (Senior Management includes General Manager, Chief Financial Officer, and Department Directors.)
column31: Employees are treated fairly by management.
column32: Management promptly addresses complaints in a meaningful way.
column33: I am comfortable approaching my manager with a concern.
column34: I approve of Senior Management. (Senior Management includes General Manager, Chief Financial Officer, and Department Directors.)
column35: Senior Management listens to suggestions. (Senior Management includes General Manager, Chief Financial Officer, and Department Directors.)
column36: I trust the direction our Senior Management is going with the company. (Senior Management includes General Manager, Chief Financial Officer, and Department Directors.)
column37: I am confident that JLG will continue to be a viable company after the pandemic.
column38: I am confident that JLG services will be relevant for years to come.
column39: I approve of how JLG is addressing social issues.
column40: I intend to be working here in 12 months’ time.
column43: The ability to social distance within the office.
column44: The ability to social distance in the building's public spaces (lobby, stairs, restrooms etc.)
